thread.title: White House pushes China to cut trade gap by $100 bln

title: White House pushes China to cut trade gap by $100 bln
text:
White House pushes China to cut trade gap by $100 bln 6:09am EDT - 01:03 
The White House clarifies a tweet from President Donald Trump last week that the U.S. is pressing Beijing to slash its trade imbalance with the United States by $100 billion, not merely $1 billion as he first said, as fears of a trade war heat up.   
The White House clarifies a tweet from President Donald Trump last week that the U.S. is pressing Beijing to slash its trade imbalance with the United States by $100 billion, not merely $1 billion as he first said, as fears of a trade war heat up.  //reut.rs/2pgh5IR
